title: Episode 20: The Lost Girls of Panama
description:
Traveling abroad with your best friend sounds like a dream come true, but for Kris Kremers and Lisanne Froon it became a living nightmare. More than four years after they went missing in the Panamanian jungle there still isn't a definitive answer as to what tragedy befell these women. Phone records recovered from their cell phones tell a story of two women desperately trying to get help. Pictures recovered from their camera seem like they were trying to send a message to their families as to what had happened. But what did happen still remains a mystery...

itunes:subtitle: Was this a hiking trip gone terribly wrong or is something much more sinister to blame?
